verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Purify my heart
Let me be as gold and precious silver
Purify my heart
Let me be as gold, pure gold

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Refiner's fire
My heart's one desire
Is to be holy
Set apart for You, Lord
I choose to be holy
Set apart for You, my Master
Ready to do Your will

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Purify my heart
Cleanse me from within
And make me holy
Purify my heart
Cleanse me from my sin
Deep within
